titles.title: Expressing the commitment of the Members of the House of Representatives to fostering a productive and collegial partnership with the 43rd President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mr. Horn asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
DEBATE - Under reservation of objection, the House proceeded with debate on H. Res. 677.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Introduced. Expresses the commitment of the Members of the House of Representatives to fostering a productive and collegial partnership with the 43rd President in order to bring comity to the Government and progress to the United States.
